    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hippogriff in a Jar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1949)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Expandable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=475" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 56 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bottle contains a shrunken [hippogriff](/Monsters.aspx?ID=698). When opened, the contents reconstitute into a Large effigy of a hippogriff. The hippogriff waits up to 1 round and allows two creatures to mount it, then Flies up to 65 feet and waits 1 more round to give the mounted creatures time to dismount. Creatures who are still mounted on the hippogriff when it dissolves fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) in the space where the hippogriff corpse ends its movement.

**Craft Requirements** Supply the corpse of a hippogriff.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
